Audio.Locality: Montezuma Peak Road, Pueblo Rico, Risaralda, W Andes - Tatama National Park
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Montane forest. Not seen. Tentatively identified by comparison with XC13941 and 56495. P. granadensis was photographed at Finca Montezuma (1375m) two days later. 21/08/2014 Correct ID given by Du≈°an M. Brinkhuizen.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
